skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Specializing in web development, I create dynamic, visually engaging websites with custom front-end and back-end solutions tailored to your needs.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in Node.js, Laravel, and NestJS to build scalable, secure, and customized web solutions tailored to client needs.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Focused on creating intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that enhance the user experience and engagement across web and mobile platforms

skills.title: Application Development
skills.description: Experienced in building cross-platform applications that prioritize performance, scalability, and an engaging user experience across web and mobile devices.

portfolio.title: Kabba Passenger
portfolio.description: Kabba Passenger is an innovative mobile app by Kabba Transport Organization, addressing transportation issues in Addis Ababa. Key features include user registration, trip booking, wallet integration, real-time driver tracking, and route search. The app revolutionizes transportation in the city by providing a user-friendly solution for residents' diverse needs.

portfolio.title: Kabba Kids
portfolio.description: The project aims to develop a mobile app for carpooling in Addis Ababa, serving schools and the general public. Key features include registration for parents and children, easy payment handling, real-time driver tracking, and a chat function for communication between parents and drivers. The app aims to revolutionize carpooling in the city.

portfolio.title: Edl App and Backend
portfolio.description: Edl is a versatile app for ride-hailing and delivery services, offering trip creation, real-time tracking, wallet management, various payment options, ratings, notifications, user profiles, and more. Available on Play Store and App Store, it provides a convenient and user-friendly experience.

testimonial.description: He is a professional developer, he is focused, he follows clean code, he has good cognitive skills, and he gives advice. I advise you to hire him. Thank you, and we will work together in the future.
